-- docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1QSVsuAAMhBrhiZdTihVfSCwPzbbZWDLCtXWP23CU0ko
local a=UnitDefs or{}local b='armassistdrone'local c='corassistdrone'local d='legassistdrone'local e='corsat'a[b].energycost=2000;a[b].metalcost=100;a[c].energycost=2000;a[c].metalcost=100;a[d].energycost=2000;a[d].metalcost=100;a[e].sightdistance=3100;a[e].radardistance=4080;a[e].cruisealtitude=3300;a[e].energyupkeep=1250;local f={'armapt3','corapt3','legapt3','armshltx','corgant','leggant','armshltxuw','corgantuw','leggantuw'}for g=1,#f do local f=f[g]local g=#a[f].buildoptions;a[f].buildoptions[g+1]=b;a[f].buildoptions[g+2]=c;a[f].buildoptions[g+3]=d;a[f].buildoptions[g+4]=e end
